amendment.description: Amendment requires a study on the effects of the Coast Guard modifying the 2004 Agreement for Outgoing Loans with Presque Isle Township, Michigan, in order to provide for the return of the Historic Fresnel Lens to the lantern room atop the Presque Isle Light Station Lighthouse, Michigan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 111-311 to require a study on the effects of the Coast Guard modifying the 2004 Agreement for Outgoing Loans with Presque Isle Township, Michigan, in order to provide for the return of the Historic Fresnel Lens to the lantern room atop the Presque Isle Light Station Lighthouse, Michigan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Oberstar amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
